description.value:
Infected Character suffers nonpermenant Agility Damage whenever taking a Full Action or two Half Actions during one turn, or whenever performing strenous activities. To be cured, must remove all Agility Damage through rest or other means.

Requirements

Acquired in batch of 5. Any exposed to disease must make +0 Toughness Test or catch it. Nurgle Dedicated suffer disease as normal, although find it enlightening.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
